SEO Optimization

Improve your visibility on search engines and increase your organic traffic.

SEO Audit

A complete SEO audit is an essential step to assess the current performance of your site. I analyze your online presence in depth, identify technical issues, evaluate content quality and examine your backlink profile to spot improvement opportunities.

The audit covers site structure, loading speed, mobile optimization, meta tags and many other key elements. You receive a clear and detailed report with concrete recommendations, ranked by priority.

Need an SEO audit?
Contact me!

Technical SEO

Technical SEO consists of optimizing your site's infrastructure to facilitate crawling and indexing by search engines. I work on technical elements that directly influence your ranking: loading speed, URL structure, schema.org markup, XML sitemap, robots.txt file, etc.

I identify and fix common technical errors such as 404 errors, misconfigured redirects, or canonicalization issues. I also optimize your site for irreproachable mobile compatibility and good results on Google's Core Web Vitals.

Let's improve your site's structure
Contact me!

Content SEO

Quality content is one of the most important elements of an effective SEO strategy. It's not just about integrating keywords, but about creating useful, clear and informative content for your visitors. The goal is to answer their questions, showcase your expertise, and strengthen confidence in your business.

I pay particular attention to lexical field richness and variety of formulations, to avoid any over-optimization or excessive keyword repetition. This natural approach favors both user experience and good positioning in search engines.

Let's optimize your editorial content
Contact me!

Off-page SEO

Off-page SEO groups all actions taken outside your site to strengthen its reputation and authority in the eyes of search engines. The goal is not simply to obtain links, but to build a reliable and consistent presence on the web. I favor a sustainable approach, based on quality backlinks from relevant and credible sites in your field.

My services include creating attractive content to encourage natural links, targeted outreach to partners or influencers, optimizing your profiles on social networks, as well as managing your online reputation. The goal is to improve your visibility without resorting to artificial or risky practices.

Let's strengthen your online authority
Contact me!

Local SEO

For businesses that serve a local clientele, local SEO is a strategic lever. I optimize your presence in geolocated searches to attract customers located in your area of activity.

My services include creating and optimizing your Google Business Profile, improving your local visibility on search engines, managing customer reviews, as well as optimizing your site for targeted local queries.

Let's optimize your local visibility
Contact me!

SEO and Eco-design

Did you know that eco-design and SEO are closely linked? An eco-designed website presents many advantages for your referencing:

  • Improved loading speed. An important ranking factor for Google
  • Optimized user experience. Helps reduce bounce rate.
  • Clean and lightweight code.Facilitates crawling by search engines.
  • Better mobile compatibility.Fundamental for modern SEO.
  • Reduced resource consumption.Improves overall performance for a responsible web.

All my SEO services integrate eco-design principles for a double benefit : improve your ranking while reducing your site's environmental impact.

Performance Monitoring

SEO optimization is a continuous process that requires regular monitoring:

  • Analytics tools Use of Google Analytics, Google Search Console and other tools to track overall site performance.
  • Organic traffic monitoring Evolution of visitors from search engines, most visited pages, and traffic sources.
  • Keyword positioning monitoring Evaluation of your strategic keywords' positions in search results.
  • Click-through rate (CTR) analysis Measurement of your titles and descriptions' performance in Google results.
  • Technical error monitoring Detection and monitoring of 404 errors, redirects, missing tags, and indexing issues.
  • Conversion rate measurement Monitoring of actions taken by visitors (forms, purchases, etc.).
  • Monthly reports Summary of progress made, areas for improvement and upcoming priorities.
  • Strategic adjustments Continuous optimization based on collected data and evolution of your objectives.

I provide you with clear and transparent reports so you can see the concrete impact of my services on your online visibility.

FAQ

  • How much do SEO optimization services cost?

    The rate depends on the project scope, competition in your sector and your objectives. A basic SEO audit starts from CHF 500, while a monthly accompaniment generally ranges between CHF 800 and CHF 2,500, depending on the intensity of required actions. A personalized quote is always offered after analyzing your specific needs.

  • How long does it take to see SEO results?

    SEO is a medium and long-term investment. First effects can appear after 3 to 6 months, but lasting results often require 6 to 12 months. Technical optimizations can produce quick gains, while work on content and backlinks takes more time. I propose a realistic schedule from the start.

  • Do you guarantee first position on Google?

    No, and you should be wary of any such promise. No professional can guarantee a precise position, as Google's algorithms constantly evolve. However, I commit to applying best practices and improving your visibility progressively in an ethical manner (white hat SEO).

  • What are your SEO methods?

    I use only ethical SEO techniques, compliant with Google's recommendations. My method includes technical analysis of your site, content optimization, creating relevant backlinks, and regular performance monitoring. I constantly adapt to algorithm evolution.

  • Does SEO work for all types of businesses?

    Yes, but the strategy must be adapted to your business sector, your target audience and your objectives. Whether you're a local SME, a national company or an e-commerce, SEO can strengthen your visibility. I guide you toward the most relevant actions according to your situation.

  • How do you measure SEO campaign success?

    Success is measured by several key indicators: evolution of keyword positions, increase in organic traffic, improvement in conversion rate, reduction in bounce rate, and impact on your revenue. Detailed reports are sent to you regularly.

  • Should SEO continue once good positions are achieved?

    Yes, because SEO is a continuous process. Algorithms change, competitors evolve, and content must stay up to date. Maintaining your positions requires regular optimization: content updates, performance improvements, backlink monitoring, etc.

  • How does SEO integrate with my global marketing strategy?

    SEO naturally integrates with your digital strategy. It reinforces actions taken on social networks, content marketing, emailing or online advertising. My approach is global and coherent, to maximize your visibility and attract qualified traffic.

  • What happens if I change SEO providers?

    In case of transition, I conduct a takeover audit to evaluate previous work and identify areas for improvement. I ensure the transition happens smoothly, without data loss or negative impact. All access and reports belong to you, and I provide complete documentation.

  • Does SEO work for new websites?

    Yes, it's even ideal to think about SEO from site creation. For a new domain, I set up a basic SEO strategy: clean structure, targeted content, correct markup and technical performance. Even if results take a bit more time, starting with good foundations allows you to save time in the long run.

  • How do you stay up to date with Google algorithm changes?

    I conduct constant monitoring: following Google's official announcements, participating in SEO events, reading specialized publications, and exchanging with the community. This allows me to quickly adapt strategies to search engine evolution.
